desc: Hedgehog Fibres is an Irish hand dyed yarn and fibre studio located in Cork, Ireland.

layout.text:
100% Merino. Squishy and poofy, butter soft yarn that is super quick to knit. This base is totally amazing - lofty, bouncy and super soft. It takes colour beautifully and it is a joy to knit on an 10mm needle. 150g/82m, €35.90.
We have 24 amazing Potluck colourways along with some regular colours coming Saturday the 18th June at 11pm Irish Summer Time / 3pm PDT / 6pm EDT.
